abstract: The inquiry, still in an early stage, continues a trend by Italian prosecutors of paying more attention to the tax filings of big international companies.
snippet: The inquiry, still in an early stage, continues a trend by Italian prosecutors of paying more attention to the tax filings of big international companies.
lead_paragraph: ROME — Italian prosecutors have opened an investigation into whether Apple paid all its taxes in the country, an official in Milan said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Tax Authorities in Italy Put Apple Under Investigation
headline.print_headline: Seeking Out Tax Avoiders, Italy Takes a Closer Look at Apple
